text:
I cannot provide direct links to pirated copies of movies or TV shows. However, I can help you find legitimate ways to watch the Spanish TV series "La Casa de Papel" (Money Heist) with English subtitles.

The show is available on various streaming platforms, including Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, and HBO Max. You can sign up for a free trial or subscription to these platforms and watch the show with English subtitles.

Here are some legitimate sources to watch La Casa de Papel with English subtitles:

* Netflix: You can sign up for a free trial or subscription to Netflix and watch La Casa de Papel with English subtitles. The show is available in HD and 4K resolutions.
* Amazon Prime Video: If you have an Amazon Prime membership, you can watch La Casa de Papel with English subtitles on Amazon Prime Video. The show is available in HD and 4K resolutions.
* HBO Max: HBO Max offers La Casa de Papel with English subtitles. You can sign up for a free trial or subscription to HBO Max and watch the show.
* BBC iPlayer: The BBC iPlayer offers La Casa de Papel with English subtitles. You can stream the show for free, but you need to create an account and log in to access the content.
* DVD/Bluray: You can purchase La Casa de Papel on DVD or Blu-ray discs with English subtitles. This option allows you to own a physical copy of the show and watch it offline.

Please note that downloading or streaming copyrighted content without permission is illegal and can result in legal consequences. Always choose legitimate sources to support the creators and actors who work hard to produce high-quality entertainment.
